I am Pravin,

I specialise in React, NextJs, NodeJs & Express

View My Work

I Specialize In

Creating fullstack applications mainly focusing on MERN as my tech stack. Created multiple static websites with HTML, CSS & Javascript and web apps with React and NodeJs.

MONGO DB

Created Database schemas for various uses like posts, users.

REACT

Used React NextJS to build optimum web app and website with server-side rendering for SEO. Created re-usable components.

EXPRESS

Created headless backend web servers using Express JS and built api routes to communicate with the frontend.

NODE JS

Built backend for various websites using NodeJs as the runtime environment on the server side.

My Creative Process

All of my web development and design projects are based off a practiced formula to get the results that I am looking for

1

Discuss The Project

Put the goal of the client or idea onto paper and note down all the details that would be important to the project.

2

Brainstorming ^ Concept

Layout the plan how the website and app would be built and the functionality of the site and the tech stack that would be ideal.

3

UI/UX Planning

Plan out the design of the website and discuss requirements of the project with the designer.

4

Code & Communicate

Start coding the project and keep clients and managers upto date about the project.
